entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
